item.title: Qualcomm- Shoulda Shoulda
item.description: We teamed up with Gifted Youth to fully realize this fun three minute video for Qualcomms Snap Dragon processor. The tight 3 week turnaround included a fully green screen shoot, 3D set building and modeling, design and animation.
item.content:encoded: We teamed up with Gifted Youth to fully realize this fun three minute video for Qualcomms Snap Dragon processor. The tight 3 week turnaround included a fully green screen shoot, 3D set building and modeling, design and animation.

item.title: PARISTEXAS
item.description: PARISTEXAS opened its doors in the spring of 2007 to an entirely new shopping experience in the heart of Copenhagen. PARISTEXAS is an exclusive fashion store focusing on specially selected designer products for men and women.

item.title: Unrivalled Creativity - Douglas & Gordon Compendium
item.description: Ideas factory and Douglas & Gordon have come together to create Unrivalled Creativity, a book which celebrates the 12-year relationship between the two companies. The high quality printing and binding of this book reflects the sensibilities of Ideas Factory, and the work inside it is testament to their bright, innovate ideas which have gone from strength to strength over the past 12 years.
item.content:encoded: Ideas factory and Douglas & Gordon have come together to create Unrivalled Creativity, a book which celebrates the 12-year relationship between the two companies. The high quality printing and binding of this book reflects the sensibilities of Ideas Factory, and the work inside it is testament to their bright, innovate ideas which have gone from strength to strength over the past 12 years.

item.title: Étude Op. 2: 1-4
item.description: Etude Op.2, No 1-4 is the second opus in an ongoing series of meditations on form and memory. The Études' deliberately minimal approach alludes to an abstract narrative of loss and revival. In succession: Cocoon, Bloom, Flight, High Tide. Formal variation, restrained palettes, and austere compositions invite the viewer into intricately textured worlds that echo beyond the surface of the image. Drawing informs the character of this series of Études. The dimensional form and composition of each piece is inspired by textures and elements within an original series of improvisational graphite drawings preserving a sense of immediacy in the final pieces. http://www.theghostlystore.com/collections/sougwen-chung
item.content:encoded: Etude Op.2, No 1-4 is the second opus in an ongoing series of meditations on form and memory. The Études' deliberately minimal approach alludes to an abstract narrative of loss and revival. In succession: Cocoon, Bloom, Flight, High Tide. Formal variation, restrained palettes, and austere compositions invite the viewer into intricately textured worlds that echo beyond the surface of the image. Drawing informs the character of this series of Études. The dimensional form and composition of each piece is inspired by textures and elements within an original series of improvisational graphite drawings preserving a sense of immediacy in the final pieces. http://www.theghostlystore.com/collections/sougwen-chung

item.title: Wizzair.com redesign
item.description: Whenever a new project turns up in the house, we all end up becoming experts on things we have never even imagined. This time, we took to the skies, learned plenty about aviation services and by now almost all of us could in theory land a plane. Well, maybe not. What we did do, however, was what we do best: a brand new, shiny site accommodating a faster and simpler booking system. With a truly clever touch, we set to work by executing an in-depth research. Decisions regarding the new site were based on the results. The site went live and is now used throughout the most of Europe. Aye aye Captain, we made it! Thank you for flying with Mito.
item.content:encoded: Whenever a new project turns up in the house, we all end up becoming experts on things we have never even imagined. This time, we took to the skies, learned plenty about aviation services and by now almost all of us could in theory land a plane. Well, maybe not. What we did do, however, was what we do best: a brand new, shiny site accommodating a faster and simpler booking system. With a truly clever touch, we set to work by executing an in-depth research. Decisions regarding the new site were based on the results. The site went live and is now used throughout the most of Europe. Aye aye Captain, we made it! Thank you for flying with Mito.

item.title: Bermellón
item.description: Bermellon is a Mexican candy confectionery shop, whose products are very popular in the country. The company's main objective is to claim these types of traditional treats found on Mexican streets and markets and take it to a premium market.

item.title: Airbnb host analytics
item.description: In a two week project I worked with airbnb in San Francisco to design the new host analytics tool for airbnb.com. The tool helps the hosts to analyze the performance of their listings. It also provides options and suggestions how to improve the listings. In addition we worked on concepts for more features to refine the modular tool over time.
item.content:encoded: In a two week project I worked with airbnb in San Francisco to design the new host analytics tool for airbnb.com. The tool helps the hosts to analyze the performance of their listings. It also provides options and suggestions how to improve the listings. In addition we worked on concepts for more features to refine the modular tool over time.

item.title: 5 TO 12
item.description: This award winning series of images was produced for B.U.N.D. eV, Germanys biggest environmental organisation. Its purpose was to highlight the threat of extinction to several of the worlds most endangered species.

item.title: Creatorica Yellowstone UI v1.0
item.description: Yellowstone in the first Creatorica UI, created for mobile/tablet environment and in retina display resolution (326 dpi). You can download the full layered file - PSD - and use in private or commercial projects. Just pay with a tweet. In the file, every element is editable, 99% vector and smart objects, for you to play with them and make them better!
item.content:encoded: Yellowstone in the first Creatorica UI, created for mobile/tablet environment and in retina display resolution (326 dpi). You can download the full layered file - PSD - and use in private or commercial projects. Just pay with a tweet. In the file, every element is editable, 99% vector and smart objects, for you to play with them and make them better!
